definition: overcast (weather)/cloudy/shady/Yin (the negative principle of Yin and Yang)/negative (electric.)/feminine/moon/implicit/hidden/genitalia

sentences.english: A physical examination incidentally revealed an enlarged left scrotum.
sentences.chinese: 理學檢查發現左陰囊腫大。

sentences.english: This tube leads from the scrotum into the abdomen.
sentences.chinese: 輸精管自陰囊引出，進入腹腔。

sentences.english: Postoperative hematoma of scrotum occurred in 1 case ( 1/82 ), and no other perioperative complications occurred.
sentences.chinese: 手術後陰囊血腫1例，無其他併發症。

sentences.english: Standing in front of a mirror will help in looking for any possible swelling on the scrotum.
sentences.chinese: 照著鏡子檢查會有助於探查陰囊上任何可能的腫大。

sentences.english: Sometimes the testis fails to enter the scrotum .
sentences.chinese: 有時睾丸未能降入陰囊。

sentences.english: Increased scrotal temperature can hurt sperm production.
sentences.chinese: 陰囊溫度提高會對精子生產有不良影響。

sentences.english: Scrotal and pedal edema occur in advanced cases (Fig. 148–4).
sentences.chinese: 陰囊和足部水腫出現在更進一步的病例中。

sentences.english: I have had painless swelling in my scrotum.
sentences.chinese: 我的陰囊有不痛的腫大。

sentences.english: The patients recovered smoothly, without wound infection or scrotum hematoma.
sentences.chinese: 術後恢復順利，無切口感染，無陰囊血腫。

sentences.english: Possible mechanisms by which air becames localized in the scrotum are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 文中並討論陰囊氣腫的可能機轉。

sentences.english: Objective Evaluation of CT in the diagnosis of blunt scrotal trauma.
sentences.chinese: 目的確定閉合性陰囊損傷的CT診斷價值。

sentences.english: However, before the birth of a baby boy they normally descend into his scrotum .
sentences.chinese: 然而，男嬰在誕生之前，它們通常要下降進入其陰囊。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the therapeutic effect and safety of pevisone cream in treating scrotal eczema.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察派瑞松霜對陰囊溼疹的療效及安全性。

sentences.english: NB Male animals should have two apparently normal testicles fully descended into the scrotum.
sentences.chinese: 雄性動物應該注意有兩個明顯正常的睾丸下降到陰囊。

sentences.english: In male fetuses, the testicles normally descend into the scrotum in last months before birth.
sentences.chinese: 睾丸在出生前最後數月通常會降入陰囊。

sentences.english: Boys also have a scrotum and testicles.

definition: fontanel (gap between the bones of an infant's skull)
disorder of internal organs caused by overexertion
